title: The Importance of Being Seven
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: When Dr Fairbairn is sent to Carstairs, I'm sure that Mummy will visit him there."

title: Brought to Bay; or, Experiences of a City Detective
author: Macgovan, James.
snippet: Too long ? Well,I could shove you along now as far as Carstairs, and there youmight stop some train from the south.
